H0.text: who is known as father of green revolution in india. Norman Borlaug

H1.text: who is known as father of green revolution in india. C. Subramaniam

H2.text: who is known as father of green revolution in india. B.P. Pal

H3.text: who is known as father of green revolution in india. Mankombu Sambasivan Swaminathan

A4.text: He has been called the main architect of the green revolution in India for his leadership and role in introducing and further developing high‑yielding varieties of wheat and rice.

A5.text: Swaminathan's collaborative scientific efforts with Norman Borlaug, spearheading a mass movement with farmers and other scientists and backed by public policies, saved India and Pakistan from certain famine‑like conditions in the 1960s.
